instructions.name: The Puffer Fish
instructions.title: Over Stuffed
instructions.setup: Place 2 equipment cards from each hero deck beneath this card.
instructions.gameplay:
At the end of the villian turn, reveal a random card beneath this card. Deal tho owner of that card H*2 projectile damage, then put that card into play in their area. If no cards are revealed this way The puffer fish deals all hero targets H+1 sonic damage.

 If The Puffer Fish has 0 or less hp immediately flip this card.
instructions.advanced: At the end of the villian turn play the top card of the environment deck.

back.title: Dance to the Beat
back.gameplay:
When flipped to this side the Puffer Fish regains all his hp, place all cards beneath this card into the respective players hands, and destroy all but 1 of each hero's equipment cards in play. 

Villian Ongoing cards are indestructible. 

Start of the villian turn: Reveal cards from each hero deck until one ongoing is revealed and put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the deck. 

If any hero ever has more than 2 ongoing cards in play, destroy all but the newest 2 Ongoing cards.
back.advanced: At the end of the villian turn the puffer fish deals each hero target 2 sonic damage.
